name: Ground night theme shenanigans (Prototype)
description:
Exploit the day and night themes to progress on this weird aventure !

This game was made in 3 hours (The working on the itch.io page don't count). After the 3 hours, I didn't added anything new in the game.

Inspiration : Super Mario Maker 2's day and night themes

Mobile friendly version :
